page.title: 09BUS SERVICES
page.content:
The Midland Red South, part of the {National Bus Company,}runs buses to and from Leamington Spa and Stratford upon Avon. The Leamington service is supplemented by coaches from David R Grasby, a{private Company. Commuters are adequately served in the early morning and late afternoon and there is a single lunch time service each day. No buses run on Sundays.
There are complaints periodically about the lack of buses for shoppers but a free weekly bus runs to the market at Moreton in the Marsh.
